name: Auditor Base Pattern
description: Abstract base class for structured auditors with VERIX-compatible output. Includes Illocution, Affect, ActionClass enums and AuditorResult dataclass with confidence ceiling enforcement.
example_usage:
from library.components.patterns.auditor_base import BaseAuditor, AuditorResult
class MyAuditor(BaseAuditor):
    auditor_type = 'custom'
    def audit(self, artifact, eval_report, config): ...
